import React from 'react' import { Grid, Image, Container } from 'semantic-ui-react' export default function About() { const containerStyles = { 'font-size': 'large', 'font-family': "'Montserrat', sans-serif", } return ( What does it mean ‘to translate’? A quick answer could be: to say the same thing in a different language.
— Umberto Eco ) }
